attributes.action: Allow all foreign nationals who serve in the Armed Forces to stay in the UK on completion of exemplary service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent media concerns regarding the unfairness of who stays and who goes has highlighted something desperately wrong with this country. This is particularly pertinent to the treatment of Gurkhas who retired before 1997 and their protest at Parliament on Wednesday 19th March 2008. The fact that these heroes of the British Army  are not allowed to stay in this country after serving it with such loyalty, dedication and distinction, whilst criminals and other undesirables are allowed to stay, is a National Disgrace and should be rectified immediately.
